title: Akali: Why even bother?
body:
Before I begin with my in-depth comparison between assassins and why playing Akali is pretty much pointless, I just want to say that I mained Akali from her release to 2013.

No matter how Akali's played, she'll remain a low-tier assassin. Her kit has so much potential to be something good, but Riot always keeps her back for some unknown reason. Maybe it's because she has the most power spikes as an assassin or because her roaming and damage are uncontested due to three dashes.

Her early game is horrendous. Her damage is insanely low. No matter what, every other assassin will beat you in trades. Speaking of trades, she's pretty much gimped from when she lost the ability to proc her Q with her E. Most, if not all, champions she'll verse in the middle lane are ranged and will not just let her throw out a Q and then allow her to proc it for free.

"_But her W! Why won't you use your W_!"

Pointless. Her W has an artificial delay that hinders her other abilities. You cannot W > R instantly because there's some kind of ridiculous cooldown. Not only this, but it is a huge waste of energy and it removes her ability to use it defensively.

This also brings me to her R and why it has some stupid two-second cooldown after each use. This makes her late game so clunky to the point that you need to incorporate CDR into your build/runes/masteries so you're not just standing there for two seconds while you wait for your next charge. This is my biggest gripe. It works well during the early-mid game, but it fails late game and her damage suffers due to it.

**How to fix her**

1. Allow us to proc her Q with her R or, maybe, her E.
2. Make her Q travel at the same speed as her R. This is another clunky mechanic that should have been fixed ages ago. Throwing out a Q and then using R is pointless because you hit two autos before the Q actually lands.
3. Cut the movement speed from her W and make her regain energy faster while shrouded.
4. This is more of a rant, but Katarina should not be able to hit stealthed targets with her ultimate. This removed any counterplay Akali has versus Katarina. The two were often equally matched, but now Katarina just destroys Akali. Shunpo > Dagger > Ultimate = dead stealthed Akali.
5. Give her a visual makeover, please. Also, some new lines would be nice.

**Assassins that beat Akali**

Ekko: early game, mid game, late game.
Evelynn: early game, mid game.
Fizz: early game, mid game, late game.
Kassadin: early game, late game.
Katarina: early game, mid game, late game.
Kha'Zix: early game, late game.
LeBlanc: early game, mid game, late game.
Master Yi: late game.
Nocturne*: mid game, late game.
Rengar: early game, late game.
Shaco: early game, mid game.
Talon: early game, mid game, late game.
Zed: early game, mid game, late game.

*Why is he listed as an assassin?

Akali has her strengths, but other champs have them as well.

Ekko: better trading, damage, escape.
Evelynn: bigger burst damage due to no clunky cooldowns.
Fizz: better trading, higher burst, better escape.
Kassadin: better poke, better mobility, better burst.
Katarina: better trading, better mobility, resourceless, AoE damage that shuts down Akali's kit, better resets.
Kha'Zix: better burst, better mobility.
LeBlanc: better trading, higher nuke damage, better mobility.
Master Yi: lmao R + auto = everyone dead.
Nocturne*: -
Rengar: cancerous burst damage.
Shaco: better stealth, better burst, traps ruin her shroud.
Talon: better mobility, better burst, better stealth, better roaming.
Zed: broken beyond all rational explanations.

Fix her, Riot.

{{champion:84}}  is actually really good if you know how to play her. And match-ups don't really mean anything (asides from perhaps playing a bit more carefully) if you fully know how to play the champion.

Here is proof from Rank 1 Akali World: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDIJhfKjVYlbo5-oQvM5EqQ

I was about to link the same thing haha.

On another note Akali has some of the highest if not actually the highest trade potential of any champion in the game.

I've played top lane into a plat 2 trynd (I'm g5) with cloth armor start.

After 3 trades he went back to his tower and actually wrote in all chat "How the f*** do you do so much damage you only have cloth armor??!"

Watch the guy linked above, he shows you how insane Akali is in the correct hands.

>
> {{champion:84}}  is actually really good if you know how to play her. And match-ups don't really mean anything (asides from perhaps playing a bit more carefully) if you fully know how to play the champion.
> 
> Here is proof from Rank 1 Akali World: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDIJhfKjVYlbo5-oQvM5EqQ

I never said she wasn't good. I simply said that it's pointless to pick her when everyone can do what she does better.
With that logic, why ever pick any assassins that aren't Fizz or Zed?
Professor Akali is good but he is not the Rank 1 Akali in the world, he's either full of himself or he uses that title as clickbait
alkalis decent and can still snowball hard if you know what your doing. master yi is better than akali... gtfo of here with that shit.

Yes bring back her ability to Proc Q with E. I agree.

The problem with Akali is the same problem Riot have had with several other champions. Buff them slightly, OP pick ban, nerf them a little, shit tier why play them.
The big nerf hammer from Riot came when "Tank Akali" was running rampant early last year.

They need to simply change her so she's not a lifesteal assassin.
Maybe do what you say, and add regen to the shroud (while in combat) otherwise she could easily take bad trades sit under tower in shroud and heal back up.
Let her Heal of her Q proc, but only when she busts it with her E. So she can heal for a bunch but not 3-4 times.

I dunno. Like i said, if you buff her shes becomes easily broken, leave her as is, and she is in the category of "you can play her but why". Which i honestly think Riot consider acceptable.
